Trade/Device Name(s): Oral Fluid Cocaine Metabolite (Benzoylecgonine) Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Oral Fluid Cocaine Metabolite (Benzoylecgonine) Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay, Calibrators and Controls for qualitative cocaine metabolite detection in oral fluid
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of cocaine metabolite in human saliva (oral fluid) at a cutoff of 15 ng/mL using Salivette collector, for preliminary drug of abuse testing with confirmatory analysis by GC/MS.
